q1_general_response: {"answer": "The image shows a brown, irregularly shaped spot on the skin. It has uneven borders and varying shades of brown within the lesion itself. The surrounding skin appears normal."}
q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "Based on the image, the lesion could indicate a melanocytic nevus (mole) or potentially melanoma. Given the irregular shape and uneven color distribution, melanoma cannot be ruled out without further examination. Atypical nevus is also a possibility."}
